name: NOKIA T20 Wi-Fi Android Tablet (10.4 Inch, 4GB RAM, 64GB ROM)

prod_desc.heading: Why buy Nokia T20 WiFi Android Tablet
features: 4GB RAM | 64GB ROM | Expandable Upto 512 GB massive storage
26.42 cm (10.4 inches) 2K Display For clear and crisp display
8 MP Primary Camera | 5 MP Front for true life colours photography
Battery: 8200 mAh Lithium-ion For longer use
sub_features: Be more and do more with this tablet from Nokia. It allows you to do so much with a host of features. This sleek and lightweight Nokia T20 WiFi Android Tablet is encased in a seamless sandblasted aluminium unibody, making it ideal to take along with you wherever you go. Watch movies, listen to music or work on your office projects on this tab. It features a 26.42 cm (10.4 inches) 2K Display that provides sufficient viewing space, along with clear and crisp visuals that oozes out vibrant and gorgeous colours, so you can indulge in your favourite content on it conveniently. Thanks to its 64 GB of ROM, 4 GB of RAM, it lets you store all the files, data, images, media, high definition videos, leaving space for a lot more as it can be expanded up to 512 GB. This tab makes use of the Unisoc T610 processor, 1.8 GHz chip to give you fast processing performance. This way, you can enjoy lag-free use.

This Nokia T20 WiFi Android Tablet is here to keep you entertained and productive for the perfect balance. Immerse yourself into a cinematic audio-visual experience by bringing home this tablet as it has a stereo speaker powered by an amplifier and optimised by surround technology. This tablet not only features a stylish and aesthetic design but is lightweight as well, making it your ideal travel companion. Experience smooth gaming and quicker load times, thanks to the powerful 4 GB RAM with faster processing speeds. The massive 8200 mAh (typical) battery lets you breeze through the day without the constant worry of charging. If you ever run low, the 10 W fast charger will charge your phone in no time. Thanks to the support of WLAN 802.11a/b/g/n/ ac, you can enjoy fast and strong connectivity so that you can game, stream movies, and more with ease. So take this Nokia T20 WiFi Android Tablet home with you.

features.title: Memory
features.desc: 4 GB RAM, 64 GB ROM, Expandable upto 512 GB

features.title: Camera
features.desc: 8 MP Primary Camera, 5 MP Front Camera

features.title: Battery
features.desc: 8200 mAh Battery With 15 Watts Fast Charging

faqs.que: Can we make calls from Nokia tablet?
faqs.ans: LTE 4G for data connection is only available with a Nano SIM card. The device does not support standard calls or text messages.

faqs.que: Can you put a SIM card in a Nokia tablet?
faqs.ans: Open the SIM card tray: push the tray opener pin into the tray hole and slide the tray out. Put the nano-SIM in the SIM slot on the tray with the contact area face down. If you have a memory card, put it in the memory card slot. Slide the tray back in.

faqs.que: Can 4G SIM work in Nokia tablet?
faqs.ans: On dual SIM capable devices, both SIM1 and SIM2 slots support 4G networks. However, if your SIM1 and SIM2 are both LTE SIM cards, the primary SIM will support 4G/3G/2G networks, while the secondary SIM can only support 2G networks.

faqs.que: How long do Nokia tablets usually last?
faqs.ans: They can perform well for up to two years, after which if the software is not updated, it may require constant repair. This is a problem with most Android tablets. It either begins to hang more often, works really slow, or the display shows signs of malfunctions.
